price: 199. Show forgiveness, enjoin what is good, and turn away from the foolish (i.e. don’t punish them).
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
